cases.title: Online Store for Esoteric Goods
cases.description: Development of a modern e-commerce store for selling esoteric goods with process automation
cases.fullDescription: Created a full-featured e-commerce store for selling esoteric goods with order management, inventory, and customer database systems.
cases.challenges: Need to create an intuitive interface for complex product categorization (crystals, tarot cards, candles, etc.)
solutions: Development of a smart filtering system based on product properties

cases.title: AI Assistant for 'Fire Phoenix' School

cases.title: Landing Page for 'Fire Phoenix' Chinese Online School
cases.description: Development of a sales landing page for a Chinese language school with a booking system and client acquisition
cases.fullDescription: Created a modern sales landing page for the 'Fire Phoenix' Chinese language online school. The website includes an online course booking system, information about teachers, educational programs, and student reviews.
cases.challenges: Need to stand out in the competitive online education market and build trust with potential students
solutions: Development of bright, memorable design with elements of Chinese culture
Implementation of an online booking and feedback system

members.name: Danil Khudoy
members.description: Chief Executive Officer and Head of Development with over 6 years of experience in fullstack development and digital project management. Has worked in major digital and big tech companies, as well as developed his own projects. Specializes in strategic management, building product teams, and launching high-load services.
members.bio: Started his career in 2019 as a developer, quickly grew to team lead and later to CEO of his own studio. Experience includes developing and launching e-commerce stores, fintech solutions, educational platforms, and corporate services. As CEO, was responsible for strategy, financial planning, investor relations, as well as establishing development processes and team management.
members.creates: IT products for business, SaaS platforms, mobile applications, Telegram bots, corporate systems
skills: Integration of AI solutions into products

members.name: Andrey Kuligin
members.description: Head of Backend with experience in architecture design, developing scalable services, and automating business processes.
members.bio: Since 2020, has been engaged in development and design of server systems. Experience covers creating web applications, Telegram bots and mini apps, as well as implementing complex business solutions. Responsible for service scalability and reliability, API design, and integration of modern technologies. Manages a team of backend developers, establishes development processes, and ensures high code quality.
members.creates: High-load web services, APIs, microservices, corporate solutions, Telegram bots and Mini Apps
skills: Business logic integration and process automation
Development and scaling of Telegram Mini Apps

members.name: Ekaterina Smirnova
members.description: Head of Design with experience in creating digital products, brand identity, and user interfaces. Responsible for visual strategy and user experience quality.
members.bio: Creates unique and memorable digital products. From idea to implementation: website and application design that distinguishes the brand and engages the audience.
members.creates: UI/UX for web and mobile applications, design systems, animations and interactives
skills: Creating design systems and UI kits

members.name: Denis Kotelnikov
members.description: Head of Frontend with experience in development and team management. Responsible for client application architecture, implementation of modern technologies, and development of engineering culture.
members.bio: Manages the frontend department, forms interface development strategy, and is responsible for user experience quality. Oversees architecture design, implementation of new tools, and team training. Work experience covers projects from startups to large enterprise, including high-load platforms and e-commerce solutions.
members.creates: Modern web applications, PWAs, UI libraries, mobile interfaces
